verbs.description: [ARG0: Former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper] [V: accuses] [ARG1: Speaker Paul Ryan ( R - Wis . ) and Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell ( R - Ky . )] [ARGM-LOC: in a new book] [ARG2: of not caring about foreign interference in the 2016 election as long as President Trump won] .

Former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper accuses [ARG0: Speaker Paul Ryan ( R - Wis . ) and Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell ( R - Ky . )] in a new book of [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: caring] [ARG1: about foreign interference in the 2016 election] [ARGM-TMP: as long as President Trump won] .

Former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper accuses Speaker Paul Ryan ( R - Wis . ) and Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell ( R - Ky . ) in a new book of not caring about foreign interference in the 2016 election as long as [ARG0: President Trump] [V: won] .
